taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species longipes;

treatment.description: Resembling no. 42 in its strong canes and prickles but the latter often claw-like; leaves promptly glabrate, as are the at first villous and glandular pedicels; primocane-leaves 5-foliolate, the median subrhombic-obovate leaflets long-petiolulate, the terminal one broadly elliptic and abruptly acuminate; stipules of larger leaves lance-linear, 1.5-2 cm. long; floricane-leaflets mostly narrowly obovate and blunt; flower1, on promptly glabrate pedicel 1.5-3.5 cm. long.
